name: AfroDoom
description:
Granny Curdle's new Devilberry Jam recipe has resulted in opening portals to Hell, and the whole Jam Factory is in peril!

Afroduck must clean up this mess armed with nothing but a shotgun.

Made for CurdleJam#15 themed: "Cat's out of the bag".

Fight your way through 2 levels in this Doom-like retro shooter, set as a direct sequel to the CurdleJam#13 entry 'Jam Factory'.

Controls:
Arrows/WASD to move
Mouse to turn/shoot

Consume jam burritos right off the floor to recover 10 health!
